title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11 ยง 221.2 - Definitions
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11 ยง 221.2 - Definitions

State Regulations
(a) The definitions contained in article 28 of the Insurance Law ("article 28") shall apply to this Part. (b) The definitions contained in section
107
of the Insurance Law shall also apply to article 28 and this Part except as provided in article 28. (c) Adverse action as defined in section 2801(a) includes the non-renewal of a policy of personal lines insurance. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 11
ยง
221.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
